text: Absolutely love this laptop! The performance for content creation and gaming is incredible, especially the NVIDIA GTX 1060. Boots up super fast and handles everything I throw at it. The screen brightness is also top-notch. Highly recommend for anyone looking for a beast like the Refurbished: Acer Predator Helios 300 G3-571-77QK 15.6" Intel Core i7 7th Gen 7700HQ (2.80 GHz) NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 16 GB Memory 256 GB SSD Windows 10 Home 64-Bit Gaming Laptop (Manufacturer Recertified)!

Absolutely love this laptop! The performance for streaming games is incredible, especially the NVIDIA GTX 1060. Boots up super fast and handles everything I throw at it. The trackpad is also top-notch. Fantastic gaming laptop for the price. Getting amazing FPS in Fortnite and Cyberpunk 2077. The build quality of the Refurbished: Acer Predator Helios 300 G3-571-77QK 15.6" Intel Core i7 7th Gen 7700HQ (2.80 GHz) NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 16 GB Memory 256 GB SSD Windows 10 Home 64-Bit Gaming Laptop (Manufacturer Recertified) is solid, and the port selection is a joy to use. A definite 5 stars!
